actions.name: Desolate Land

cost.trigger: The user enters combat or when the user gains this Ability.

actions.description:
Trigger: The user enters combat.

Effect: Connection - Sunny Day. Sunny Weather is set until it is overridden or if the user gains @Affliction[fainted] or leaves combat. If the user gains @Affliction[fainted] or leaves combat while Sunny Weather is present, Sunny Weather will remain for 3 Rounds.

actions.name: Desolate Land (Active)
actions.description: Intense Heat Weather is set until it is overridden or the user gains @Affliction[fainted] or leaves combat. If the user gains @Affliction[fainted] or leaves combat while Intense Heat is present, the Weather is set to Sunny for 5 Rounds.
